title: Suns Euphoria and Clippers' Future
description:
Zach talks to ESPN's resident Suns fan Michael Schwartz about what this Finals run means to him, then ESPN's Kevin Arnovitz joins to discuss Chris Paul finally making the Finals, Kawhi Leonard, and what comes next for the Clippers. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
